name: Dulce de Leche Cheesecake
description: Thank you, Kasandra Gagnon, for this recipe! Bust the heat with this creamy, caramel dream—think: tiramisu meets no-bake cheesecake! All you need is your pudding mix and three simple ingredients. And we’ve got a sweet surprise for all the sugar-conscious folks out there—this dessert boasts only 7 g of sugar per slice (for 12 slices). Pro tip: swirl in a little grand Marnier or coffee liqueur into your filling, then freeze in popsicle molds for an adult pop!

ingredients.name: Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix
9" graham pie shell or prebaked crust

preparation: Using a stand mixer or hand mixer, beat cream cheese with mix on medium-high speed until smooth. Scrape the sides of the bowl.
Gradually add cream, whipping until soft peaks form.
Fill into prepared pie shell; smooth top. Drizzle on fudge sauce, if desired.
Freeze 2 hr, or until set. Refrigerate until ready to serve. If making ahead, keep frozen and place in refrigerator prior to serving.

products.name: Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Rich, creamy, and dreamy! It makes a pudding in minutes – so you can enjoy it anytime you’re looking for a quick, sweet treat – and is versatile enough to make bread puddings, energy balls, caramelized carrots, and more!
